# fmc_range_objects (Resource)

Resource for Network Range Objects in FMC

## Example
An example is shown below: 
```hcl
resource "fmc_range_objects" "servers" {
    name        = "k8s-cluster"
    value       = "10.10.10.10-10.10.10.16"
    description = "K8s Prod Cluster"
}
```
